actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to permit duty drawback for articles shipped to the insular possessions of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to allow a drawback (refund) of duties paid on certain articles imported into the United States and later exported to the U.S. Virgin Islands, American Samoa, Wake Island, Midway Islands, Kingman Reef, Guam, Canton Island, Enderbury Island, Johnston Island, or Palmyra Island.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to permit duty drawback for articles shipped to the insular possessions of the United States.
